attributes.action: Student Finance made available for part time Paramedic degree
attributes.additional_details:
we have had positive, supportive responses from many people and although they agree that there should be support for paramedics We have received this response from student finance England 
“I have had a look at the courses Outreach Rescue provide and they would not be considered designated courses in relation to The Education (Student Support) Regulations 2011
 Also, the 3rd party company (Outreach Rescue) are not a franchise of your university.”

Please help us get this decision overturned
attributes.background:
We need the decision made by Student Finance England to not recognise the part time Paramedic BSc degree course we are in overturned. 
The course is delivered in partnership between Outreach Medical Services (ORMS) & The Robert Gordon University in Aberdeen
